column4: wamerican contains incorrect spellings of words, don't use it.
if that is the case he can edit the dhcp conf file to override what he is being sent (afaicr)
Either that or edit resolv.conf and chattr +i it
it IS in english, not in american english.
That 64bit jre doesn't work with OOo2 though.
ok, i don't really care since i don't use anything that uses java anyway
heh sounds like award bios is really secure ;)
heh i'm only 284MB into swap with just a couple apps open, gaim, gweather, gnome-terminal, xpdf, firefox
seems not to completely reset the root environment, but probably does good enough
also -s gives the benefit of allowing x apps to run directly :)
